stories.title: User Registration
stories.description: As a new user, I want to register an account so that I can access the chat application.

stories.title: User Login
stories.description: As a registered user, I want to log in to my account so that I can join chat rooms.

stories.title: Create Chat Room
stories.description: As a logged-in user, I want to create a new chat room so that I can start a conversation.

stories.title: Join Chat Room
stories.description: As a user, I want to join an existing chat room so that I can participate in discussions.

stories.title: Send Real-Time Message
stories.description: As a user in a chat room, I want to send messages in real-time so that others see them instantly.

stories.title: View Message History
stories.description: As a user, I want to see past messages in a room so that I can catch up on conversations.

stories.title: See User Status
stories.description: As a user, I want to see who is online/offline so that I know who is available to chat.

stories.title: Share Files/Images
stories.description: As a user, I want to upload and share files/images in chat so that I can share media easily.

stories.title: Typing Indicator
stories.description: As a user, I want to see when others are typing so that I know a response is coming.

stories.title: Unread Message Count
stories.description: As a user, I want to see unread message counts so that I know what needs my attention.

summary: A real-time chat application enabling users to register, log in, create/join rooms, send messages, view history, see user status, share files, with typing indicators and unread counts.
